forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 62. South wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 90. South wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening sets in over Boston, a gentle calm blankets the city, the air lingering at a comfortable warmth, hinting at a pleasant night ahead. With temperatures dipping to around 62, the late hours possess a certain allure, drawing in those who favor outdoor strolls under the clear skies. A soft south wind whispers through the streets, offering a tender caress to skin, inviting inhabitants to savor those last moments of daylight fading into twilight. The horizon melts into a deeper blue, kissed by the twinkling lights of the city, painting an enchanting scene reminiscent of nocturnal adventures.

Tomorrow, a resplendent sun will rise, heralding a day of unprecedented brightness and warmth. With temperatures expected to soar near 90, this Sunday is a call to embrace life outdoors. Its sunny disposition will beckon people to sip iced coffees in cozy cafés or explore the lush parks, the heat a gentle reminder of summer in full swing. As you consider what to wear, lighter garments in breathable fabrics will serve you well, accompanied perhaps by comfortable sandals that allow for easy movement. Engage in a stroll along the Charles River, or perhaps visit a local farmers' market, where the vibrant atmosphere pairs perfectly with the season’s bounty. The day promises to be a delightful mix of vitality and leisure, perfect for creating moments that resonate long after the sun has set.
